text: (kahpiraka) nirakarittuk kontiruntarkale avarkal vairakkiyattai - muttaltanamana vairakkiyattai - tankal ullankalil untakkik konta camayam allah tan tutar mitum, muhminkal mitum tan amaitiyai irakkiyarul ceytu, avarkalukku (payapaktiyuttum) takvavutaiya vakkiyattin mitum avarkalai nilai perac ceytan; avarkalo atarku mikavum takutiyutaiyavarkalakavum, atarkuriyavarkalakavum iruntarkal - allah cakala porulkalaiyum nankarintavanaka irukkinran
